mapper.select: select board_num, title, content, upd_date, del_check, board_code, userid, board_num2 from board_detail
select board_num, title,content, upd_date, del_check, board_code, userid, board_num2 from board_detail where board_num=#{board_num}
select board_num, title,content, upd_date, del_check, board_code, userid, board_num2 from board_detail where board_code=#{board_code}

select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select board_detail.* from board_detail where board_code=#{board_code} order by board_num) a ) a where rn between (#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}+1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update board_detail set board_num=#{board_num}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, upd_date=sysdate, del_check=#{del_check}, board_code=#{board_code}, userid=#{userid}, board_num2=nvl(#{board_num2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},board_num2) where board_num=#{board_num}
